history.proof: intros n m p H. qsimpl use: Zge_trans,Z. qsimpl use: Zge_trans,Z. qsimpl use: Zge_left,Zge_trans,Z. apply Z.le_ge. qsimpl use: Zge_left,Zge_trans,Z. qsimpl use: Zge_left,le_refl,Zge_trans,Z. qsimpl use: Zge_left,le_refl,Zge_trans,Z. apply Z.ge_le_iff. qsimpl use: Zge_left,le_refl,Zge_trans,Z. qsimpl use: Zge_left,le_refl,Zge_trans,Z. hfcrush use: Z.le_ge, Z.ge_le, Z.add_le_mono_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(p + m ?= ?M1412) = Lt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
In environment H0 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(?M1626 + ?M1628 ?= ?M1627 + ?M1629) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
In environment H1 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1842 + - ?M1843) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
The reference Zle_ge was not found in the current environment.
In environment H2 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H0 : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "n >= m" with "p + m <= p + n".
In environment H3 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H1 : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "p + n" with "p + m".

In environment H4 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H2 : forall n : nat, (n <= n)%nat H0 : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "p + n" with "p + m".

In environment H5 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H3 : forall n : nat, (n <= n)%nat H1 : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "n >= m" with "p + n >= p + m".

In environment H4 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H2 : forall n : nat, (n <= n)%nat H0 : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(?M3320 ?= ?M3320) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".

original: intros n m p H. apply Zge_trans with (m:=m) (n:=Z.add p m). apply Z.add_le_mono. apply Zge_left. apply Zle_ge. apply H. apply Z.le_refl. apply Z.le_refl. apply Z.ge_le_iff. apply H. apply Z.le_refl.
